name: nytimes
text:
"My body’s a body bag. Stuffed with pain, hot gravel and me. It hurts. Breathing hurts. Not breathing hurts. Everything bloody hurts."

Read "If Wishes Was Horses," a new short story by David Mitchell, written for @NYTmag’s Decameron Project. https://t.co/dtxO6V08Qp

name: nytimes
text: RT @nytopinion: "Attacks from self-serving, insecure men who can’t tell the difference between true patriotism and hateful nationalism will never diminish my love for this country," @SenDuckworth writes. https://t.co/5bB8G2X9p0

name: nytimes
text: After more than 4 months of coronavirus lockdown, 4 NYC zoos and the New York Aquarium are preparing to open to the public on July 24 at limited capacity https://t.co/Cvdf0eSSDY

name: nytimes
text: RT @charlie_savage: Two House hearings grappled with a C.I.A. assessment that Russia offered payments to kill American troops in Afghanistan — and White House inaction on the months-old judgment. w/ @EricSchmittNYT  https://t.co/gA2DAbjv5E
